alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon; East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades; Ochoco-John Day Highlands (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 10:55AM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Deschutes County through 1130 AM PDT... At 1053 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Millican, or 19 miles southeast of Bend, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Occasional lightning is also occurring with this storm, so seek shelter if thunder is heard. Locations impacted include... Bend and Millican. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon; East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades; Ochoco-John Day Highlands
